title: Game keeps bugsplatting
body: Every time I try to play League, my game bugsplats after champion select. I have tried to fix this multiple ways and nothing has worked as of yet.

replies.body: Never mind I fixed my game. I went and opened the .cfg file with notepad and changed the height and width numbers to my resolution.

Did you recently upgrade to a different monitor? If not, then this is likely caused by certain display driver or hardware issues. We've outlined some common fixes in our [**Bugsplat Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes), so I strongly recommend working through that guide in its entirety.

Please let me know if those steps caused any change for you.
